channel.title: Pages on Shahar Avigezer
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Shahar Avigezer

item.title: Nice to meet you!
item.description: Hi, I’m Shahar, I’ve a full stack developer for the past 6 years, currently working at Riskified mainly in JavaScript, Scala, React, Node.js. Before I fell in love with the world of development, I was a UX/UI designer for about 4 years. You can read more about it more here . In my everyday life (and at night too) I am a mother of 3 children + a dog and my superpower is being a mother of twins!
